rows.label: campfev11_3610_msg0002
rows.name: You seem in surprisingly good spirits.

rows.label: campfev11_3610_msg0004
rows.name:
Iira's in crisis, and I look as if I'm
having a good time...

rows.label: campfev11_3610_msg0006
rows.name:
When I think about all that life has
thrown at you so far, maybe all this
isn't so tough to swallow.

rows.label: campfev11_3610_msg0007
rows.name:
Of course, I'm sad about my mother...
But I just have too much going on at
the moment to grieve properly for her.

rows.label: campfev11_3610_msg0008
rows.name:
And so much has changed. I'm a Knight
of Iira now.

rows.label: campfev11_3610_msg0009
rows.name:
All I can do is live each day with
everything I've got.

rows.label: campfev11_3610_msg0011
rows.name:
I couldn't do it without you, you know.
Without the support I get from you,
and from everyone.

rows.label: campfev11_3610_msg0012
rows.name: It's true. We all need each other.

rows.label: campfev11_3610_msg0013
rows.name:
But, Shin.. I still need more. I'm not
satisfied...

rows.label: campfev11_3610_msg0014
rows.name:
Iira is full of people counting on
us for what we can do. Not just Iira,
but all across Alst.

rows.label: campfev11_3610_msg0016
rows.name:
Laura..
Just remember that some things
are impossible.

rows.label: campfev11_3610_msg0017
rows.name:
I know. But that's not going to stop
me from doing whatever I can!
